statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeNo , AA.EmployeeName , AA.UseYn , AA.PersonID
, EE.PersonType , EE.PersonName , EE.EngName , EE.Email , EE.PhoneNo1 , EE.PhoneNo2 , EE.FaxNo , EE.ImageUrl
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCEmployee AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMPerson EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = EE.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.EmployeeNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EmployeeName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND ( AA.ID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCAppointment WHERE DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# AND StartDate <= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 112) AND EndDate >= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 112)) )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeNo , AA.EmployeeName , AA.UseYn , AA.PersonID
FROM dbo.BCEmployee AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BCEmployee ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, EmployeeNo, EmployeeName, UseYn, PersonID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #EmployeeNo#, #EmployeeName#, #UseYn#, #PersonID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BCEmployee SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, EmployeeNo = #EmployeeNo# , EmployeeName = #EmployeeName# , UseYn = #UseYn# , PersonID = #PersonID# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.BCEmployee WHERE ID = #ID#; DELETE FROM dbo.BMPerson WHERE ID = #PersonID#;
